freshman.title: Freshman Website Project
text: Led the marketing and planning team as group leader. Coordinated with other teams to ensure ideas were feasible and implementable. During the Covid-19 pandemic, guided the team in finding the best mix of in-person and remote work, which helped the project succeed despite the challenging circumstances.
Designed the website UI from scratch using Adobe XD, while planning the overall project development flow.
Developed strong problem-solving skills by addressing design and implementation challenges.
Practiced effective time management and schedule adjustments to keep the project on track.
Gained experience in teamwork, negotiation, and coordinating across multiple groups.

dorm.title: Dormitory Management
text: Served as Floor Manager for 2 years and Dorm Leader for 2 years, resolving disputes and assisting residents.
Acted as a bridge between residents and the university, reporting issues and collaborating with school staff to develop solutions.
Gained skills in conflict resolution, communication, and teamwork.

images.caption: Dormitory Residents' Assembly - Report on Daily Affairs .

culture.title: Cultural Dorm Events
text: Organized and led multiple dorm cultural events, collaborating with other dorm leaders to encourage interaction among residents. Events included:
Qing-Ming Festival Spring Roll Activity - introduced Taiwanese traditions to international students and invited them to share their own cultural festivals.
Winter Solstice & Christmas Gingerbread Houses and Tangyuan - teams created gingerbread houses and enjoyed Tangyuan together, symbolizing reunion and warmth.
Dragon Boat Festival Sachet Making - residents hand-sewed rice dumpling-shaped sachets with step-by-step guides to ensure everyone could complete the task.
Planned and delegated tasks according to participants' strengths.
